Would you go on vacation for the rest of your life? Make fossil fuels stop causing climate change?</p>\n</div></div><div class=\"n2-ss-layer\" style=\"z-index: 7; overflow: visible; text-align: left; left: 0px; top: 291px; width: 250px; height: 20px; font-size: 100%;
